participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Outspoken and a bit sarcastic, but also has a caring side.
participant_1.background: I'm terrified of scorpions. My favorite color is grey. I'm employed by the US Postal Service. My father drove a car for NASCAR.

participant_2.name: Amina Hassan
participant_2.personality: Warm and friendly, with a passion for dance and a strong sense of resilience.
participant_2.background: I was born in Somalia. I was forced to marry when I was a teenager. Now I live in the United States. I like to dance.

content.text: i used to bike and play football in college . that was before i got married .
